frontMatter.title: uFin: The Challenge
frontMatter.subtitle: Promoting Values in Business through Digital Games
objectives: Establish and improve a sensorium for violations of rules and ethical standards
Sharpen the perception of blind spots in the personal value system
Strengthen empathic perception of the needs and interests of others
frontMatter.imprint: Prof. Dr. Carmen Tanner, PD Dr. Markus Christen, Dr. David Schmocker, and Johannes Katsarov (game development), koboldgames GmbH ([www.koboldgames.ch](http://www.koboldgames.ch/), technical implementation)
frontMatter.contact: [Prof.Dr. Carmen Tanner](https://www.bf.uzh.ch/de/persons/tanner-carmen), Department of Banking and Finance UZH, Center for Responsibility in Finance

radarCharts.name: Characteristics
radarCharts.text: The game uFin: The Challenge emphasizes the enhancement of soft skills while providing a high entertainment value.

radarCharts.name: GamificationElements
radarCharts.text: Within the game uFin: The Challenge the users engage in a creative process where they have to figure out ethical decisions. They experience an epic meaning by believing that they are chosen to solve a bigger ethical issue within the company.
